name: Heir
description: An ability passed down from generation to generation.

name: Mutant
description: An ability that the user was born with, but didn't inherit.

name: Boon
description: An ability gifted to the user from a higher power.

name: Pact
description: An ability that the user gained from making a deal with a powerful entity.

name: Legacy
description: An ability given to the user by a mentor at some point after birth.

name: Study
description: An ability that the user gained through years of practice and study.

name: Experiment
description: An ability that the user gained through scientific experimentation.

name: Accident
description: An ability that the user gained through a freak accident.
